ygData.subject: Re: Ore Close to Feydark
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve seen a kiln, which I assume is for pottery, and a furnace.  Is this it? ... it, so I m sure it is there.  I didn t find a place to buy ore there, but I
ygData.messageBody:
I've seen a kiln, which I assume is for pottery, and a "furnace." Is this it?


>There is a forge in Kelethin. I forget exactly where, but I've personally seen
it, so I'm >sure it is there. I didn't find a place to buy ore there, but I
didn't check every shop and >vendor, so I might have missed it. Don't know
about Steamfont or BB.
